Package com.hyunryungkim.whatgoeswhere.controllers

Class ControllerUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hyunryungkim.whatgoeswhere.controllers.ControllerUtilities
  • @Controller
public class ControllerUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for Controllers Includes name of model attributes Methods to retrieve current user info
